name: The Great War Rivals
description:
The Great War Rivals takes you back to the WW1 Great War, the first world war conflict that changed warfare forever.



Take part in every battle on the battlefield, command massive WW1 vehicles, and execute every maneuver that will turn the tide of war in your and your allies' favor.

To get from zero to hero, you must build an army of World War 1 units and troops, equip your Commander with powerful military gear and prove your might on the frontline.



To win the game, you must master strategic and tactical skills. While good tactics will win you the battle, it's an excellent strategy that you will have to think about to win the war.




The Great War Rivals Features:

Competitive Gameplay/The answer to duty's call
●Divise a plan to dominate the warzone and battle to the top
●Recruit WW1 heroes and entrust them to lead your armies in war
●Target bothersome rivals and lead epic wars against them



Social Game/The quest for unity
● Establish a strong Alliance as there is strength in numbers
● Fight and achieve on your warpath to military success alongside allies from all around the world
● Leave no one behind on the battlefield and help one another to stay united
● Win the hearts of your allies by exchanging resources and sending your commanders with reinforcement marches



World War 1 theme/The war to end all wars
● Choose to fight for the Allied or Central powers for a chance to rewrite history
● Defend against enemy attacks with a multitude of historically accurate WW1 planes, tanks, and artillery
● Unlock epic Commanders like Kaiser Wilhelm II, King George V, Alvin York or the Red Baron, famous pilot of the Albatros D.III



Attacks and Offensive
●Keep in touch with your allies through in-game real-time chat channels to strategize together against mad rivals
●Dare to defeat NPC characters to receive Commander XP, Speedups, and Resources to keep you fighting for victory
●Participate in weekly events to seize the best rewards and be the last man standing



Online War Game

●Check in daily to achieve the longest login streak
●Explore the front to gather resources, scout enemies, and defeat roaming groups of bandits
●Become a VIP player and gain explosive bonuses
●Enjoy new content being released constantly, including new Heroes, gear, and seasonal events

Start building your base, develop war strategies, take command over massive armies and emerge victorious in this classic real-time strategy game The Great War Rivals!
